detail_desc: Short A-line skirt.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a marled weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave that is open at the back with a tie. Adjustable frill-trimmed shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist with elastication at the back and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated hairbands in various materials and designs with a decorative bow.
Socks in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Shorts with an elasticated waist and narrow ribbing at the hems.

Chinos in washed, stretch premium cotton twill with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

prod_name: MACY OTS DR V5 OR FLOUNCE
detail_desc: Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with covered elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Fine-knit jumper with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved body in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back. Seam at the hips and lower section in jersey with press-studs at the crotch. Partly lined.

Pile-lined all-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey. Lined hood with ear appliqués on top and a concealed zip down the front that continues to the bottom of one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Lined, foldover ends at the sleeves and hems to keep the hands and feet warm.
X-cut playsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist. elastication at the back and short, wide legs.

Jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front, shoulder pads and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Tapered waist, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a small appliqué at the hem.

Long wedding dress in a sturdy weave with a deep V-neck at the back and a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared, circular skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short lace dress with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Calf-length silk skirt with a waistband.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Parka in a patterned cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood, partially concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Unlined.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam below the waist and a flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-3Y). Soft brushed inside.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide, elasticated ribbing at the waist. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, narrow sides, a lined gusset, and a high cut at the back.
Top in soft jersey with short butterfly sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Earrings with thin hoop pendants. Length 2.8 cm.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in soft stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slim fit with embroidery, a regular waist and zip fly.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a rounded hem.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, and concealed side pockets. Quilted lining.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.

Sleeveless playsuit in a cotton weave with flounces along the shoulder straps that continue over the shoulders. Pleats at the front of the waist and covered elastic at the back. Diagonal side pockets.
Fitted, knee-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative buttons at the top. Unlined.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Mesh inner shorts.
Flat cap in a cotton weave. Lined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim. Short dolman sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Ankle boots with peep toes and visible seams. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in premium cotton poplin with a cutaway collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Tights with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a front coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with metallic-coloured trims and a smartphone ring with a disc that can be rotated by 360°. Fits iPhones 6-8.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.

Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Fine-knit trousers in sturdy, wide ribbing with a slight sheen. High, elasticated waist with a visible zip and round metal ring at the front, dropped crotch and legs with wide, flared hems with high slits. Slim fit.

Fitted, knee-length, boat-necked dress in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature and 3/4-length dolman sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with plastic and glass beads.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs decorated with plastic stones and glass rhinestones.
Shirt in patterned viscose with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Straight-cut hem, slightly longer at the back.

Pyjamas in organic cotton pointelle jersey. Long-sleeved top with a small print motif at the top and a rippled frill at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and rippled frill at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length, straight-cut dress in a patterned weave with a high, smocked collar and short, wide sleeves. Unlined.
